thread.title: Vardy scores again as Leicester beats Crystal Palace 1-0
thread.title_full: Vardy scores again as Leicester beats Crystal Palace 1-0

title: Vardy scores again as Leicester beats Crystal Palace 1-0
text:
Leicester beats Crystal Palace 1-0 after Jamie Vardy strikes again in the Premier League THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   12:02 pmLast   12:02 pm   
People: 
United Kingdom (463) 

LEICESTER, England â€” Jamie Vardy scored for a seventh consecutive Premier League game to give Leicester a 1-0 victory over Crystal Palace on Saturday. 
Vardy made it nine goals in seven games for the Midlands club, pouncing on a wayward pass by defender Brede Hangeland and rounding the keeper to score in the 59th minute. 
Palace striker Wilfried Zaha was yellow-carded in the closing stages for a dive after tangling with Christian Fuchs. 
Scott Dann had Palace's best chance to equalize with a header. 
The win keeps Leicester firmly in the hunt for a place in next season's Europa League, with Palace four points behind.
